title: cyber threat consequences strategy
extract: As such, their impact on organizations have increased substantially. ... A strategic cyber risk is generally defined as an area or areas of strategic importance within an organization's strategy that could be impacted by a cyberattack, for example, competitive advantage or trade secrets.Nov 2, 2016
